monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Cuts through vines
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Increases Damage dealt, Reduces Damage taken and Mana Cost by 1% for every Charge stack. Capped at 15 stacks.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip two weapons. Second weapon values are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Air Sickle
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Armor Bypass
skills.description: This Monster's attacks ignore 20% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Attack Mastery
skills.description: Every physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Attack value.

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Bounty
skills.description: This Monster gets 2 random Buffs when an enemy Monster is knocked out.

skills.name: Brawn over Brains
skills.description: If this Monster would gain Sorcery (Buff), it gains Might (Buff) instead.

skills.name: Buff Charging
skills.description: When this Monster applies a Buff, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Charged Start
skills.description: This Monster starts combat with 7 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Charged Up
skills.description: Increases Damage dealt, Reduces Damage taken and Mana Cost by 1% for every Charge stack. Capped at 15 stacks.

skills.name: Crit Chance Focus
skills.description: Critical Chance values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Edge
skills.description: Each Critical Hit grants this Monster a Charge stack.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Devour
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an ally knocks out an enemy Monster, it is healed by 25% of that Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Dual Wield
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip two weapons. Second weapon values are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Fatal Cut
skills.description: 2 x 160% (320%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt, applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Killing Dance
skills.description: Whenever this Monster knocks an enemy out, it gains 3 Charge stacks and it regains half of the Charge stacks it used up during the attack.

skills.name: Leaf Slash
skills.description: 3 x 50% (150%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Long Slash
skills.description: 1 x 160% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Long Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Long Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Mighty Boost
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gains Might, they gain a shield equal to 100% of their Attack and 1 harmful Stack is removed.

skills.name: Multi Might
skills.description: Aura: Might (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Power
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Power Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Power Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Sorcery (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Scent of Blood
skills.description: Aura: Your Monsters deal 10% more damage when attacking an enemy with Bleed stacks.

skills.name: Severe Cuts
skills.description: 6 x 65% (390%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Severe Cuts Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Splatter
skills.description: Aura: When an enemy is knocked out, spread half of their Bleed stacks to the remaining enemies. (rounded up)

skills.name: Tectonic Spikes
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Typhoon Cut
skills.description: 6 x 90% (540%) physical damage (wind) applies Glory, Sidekick & Agility (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
